H0.text: Who wrote the 1930’s novel ‘Tender is the Night’. Ernest Hemingway

H1.text: Who wrote the 1930’s novel ‘Tender is the Night’. Virginia Woolf

H2.text: Who wrote the 1930’s novel ‘Tender is the Night’. William Faulkner

H3.text: Who wrote the 1930’s novel ‘Tender is the Night’. F Fitzgerald

A4.text: Fitzgerald completed his fourth novel Tender Is the Night in 1934.

A5.text: Fitzgerald's own novel debuted in April 1934 as Tender Is the Night and received mixed reviews.
